entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
